Thought: To infer the regional GDP of Hungary, understanding the economic activities and infrastructure is crucial.
Action: Agricultural and development land cover ratios can indicate economic sectors. Therefore I'll call get_landcover_ratio(Loc, "agricultural") and get_landcover_ratio(Loc, "development").

Thought: Nightlight intensity is a good proxy for economic activity and can correlate with GDP.
Action: I'll call get_night_light(Loc).

Thought: The area size of the district provides context on the scale of economic activities.
Action: I'll call get_area(Loc).

Thought: Proximity to major infrastructure like airports and ports can influence economic performance.
Action: I'll call get_distance_to_nearest_target(Loc, "airport") and get_distance_to_nearest_target(Loc, "port").

Thought: Combining land cover data, nightlight intensity, area size, and infrastructure proximity will provide a comprehensive overview to infer regional GDP.
Action: Now I can get enough information. I will stop.

Thought: With the collected data on nightlight intensity, area size, land cover ratios, and proximity to infrastructure, I have sufficient information to infer the regional GDP.
Action: I will stop here.
